actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on N={{(4-chlorophenyl)amino}carbonyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) N-((4-chlorophenyl)amino)carbonyl)-2, 6-difluorobenzamide 90% or more; and (2) N-((4-chlorophenyl)amino)carbonyl)-2,6- difluorobenzamide (25%) and inerts (75%).

titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on N={{(4-chlorophenyl)amino}carbonyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide.
